百万富婆；百万富翁的妻子

bilingual.target: 它覆盖了大约两百万英亩。

bilingual.source: You know what? It's a million-pound bank note.
bilingual.target: 你知道吗？这是一张百万英镑的钞票。

bilingual.source: There are over a million known species of arthropods.
bilingual.target: 已知的节肢动物种类超过一百万种。

bilingual.source: It has a population of over six million.
Boy's video streamed over two million times.
bilingual.target: 男孩的视频被播放了超过两百万次。

bilingual.source: Around four million people live in the Arctic region.
bilingual.target: 大约四百万人生活在北极地区。

bilingual.source: Although Esperanto is spoken by about two million people.
bilingual.target: 尽管大约有两百万人说世界语。

bilingual.source: It took Tchang a day to climb up the million steps.
bilingual.target: 昌花了一天爬上百万级台阶。

bilingual.source: People cut down nearly million trees to use as Christmas trees.
bilingual.target: 人们砍伐了近百万棵树作为圣诞树。

list.abstract: million（英 [ˈmɪljən]，美 [ˈmɪljən]），英语单词，数词，为一百万；一百万个；无数。短语搭配有millions of（百万）。例句为“He paid us two million francs for them.（他为此付给我们200万法郎。）” million相关近义词有mega、innumerability等。

yingyinNormal.en: The year I turned 26, as the head of my own brokerage firm, I made 49 million dollars, which really pissed me off, because it was three shy of a million a week.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我26岁那年依靠自己的股票经纪公司赚了4千9百万，这让我超级不爽的，就差那么3百万就可以一周赚1百万了。

yingyinNormal.en: I could eat about a million and a half of these.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能吃掉上百万块巧克力。

yingyinNormal.en: It will map 10 million stars in our galaxy and a million other galaxies beyond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 将能把我们银河系中的一千万颗星球和其他上百万个星系尽收眼底。

yingyinNormal.en: And I made that, so, you know, I know it's gonna be like a million times harder to give up a baby but, oh my God, it's gonna feel like a million times better, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我的功劳，所以，我知道送走自己生出来的孩子一定会难上百万倍，但到时的快乐一定也会是百万倍，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: She wants to bring us $38 million in business. I don't see the downside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她要给我们带来3千8百万的生意，我不觉得有什么不好的。

yingyinNormal.en: We're not gonna pay $17 million to players. I'm not asking you for 10 or 20, 30 million dollars. I'm just asking for a bit of help.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不会付给球员一千七百万。我没有问你要一千万，两千万或三千万美元，我只想多一点支持。

yingyinNormal.en: Oprah gave Lindsay $2 million, Cunnilingus gave Michael Douglas throat cancer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 奥普拉赔偿林赛2百万美元，迈克尔·道格拉斯因为总给别人口交而得了喉癌。

yingyinNormal.en: 12 million people live here now, feeding the largest manufacturing base in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现居住于此的一千两百万人正源源不断地向世界上最大的制造基地输送人才。

yingyinNormal.en: With a population of over twelve million people, the French capital is at the heart of the Ile-de-France region.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拥有超过一千两百万人口，是法国的首都，位在法兰西岛的心脏地带。

yingyinNormal.en: Some 65 million years ago, a monster 6 miles wide may have wiped out half the species on Earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大约6500百万年前，一个6英里宽的大怪物，可能消灭了地球上半数的物种。

yingyinNormal.en: Home to over 8 million people, the capital of the UK has been an important financial, educational and cultural center for hundreds of years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里是英国的首都，人口超过 8 百万，几百年来都是金融、敎育和文化的重镇。

yingyinNormal.en: Are there really dinosaurs here? No, just pretend ones. Real dinosaurs died out 65 million years ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请问这地方真的有恐龙吗？没有，这只有一些假扮的恐龙。好吧！真正的恐龙早在六千五百万年前就灭绝了。

yingyinNormal.en: There was a time before humans and there's gonna be a time after. It could be tomorrow, it could be a million years from now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然有人类出现之前的纪年，就会有人类消失后的纪年。也许就在明天，也许会在百万年以后。

yingyinNormal.en: No. No. I support you 100%. I just didn't, I didn't get it right away. You know now I'm caught up. Identical hand twins. It's a million-dollar idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我百分之百支持你，只是我一时没回过神来，我现在懂了，双胞手！这点子值上百万。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, based on the fact that our potential market is about 70 or 80 guys, and you want a submarine, I'd say about a million dollars a pop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个嘛，基于我们的潜在市场大约七八十人的事实，而你又想赚个潜水艇，我的意见是一单一百万刀。

yingyinNormal.en: Every day, this system carries over 5 million passengers citywide. Without it, traffic would overwhelm Manhattan streets, and the city couldn't function.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每天这个系统搭载着超过5百万全市乘客没有地铁，地面的交通将会拥挤不堪整座城市也会瘫痪。

yingyinNormal.en: And one of Dawson's first acts as governor was to approve a $12 million grant for that man, Jerrod Wilkins, software engineer, 41 years old, recently divorced.
yingyinNormal.zh: 道森身为州长的第一步就是批款一千两百万给那个人，杰罗德·威尔金斯，软件工程师，四十一岁，刚刚离婚。

yingyinNormal.en: For 41 million, you built a playoff team. You lost Damon, Giambi, Isringhausen, Pena, and you won more games without them than you did with them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你用四千一百万打造了一支打进季后赛的球队，没有戴蒙，吉昂比，伊斯林豪森，佩纳，没有了他们，你还赢了更多的比赛。

yingyinNormal.en: It is a light that has remained undimmed, and which now attracts 42 million visitors a year, making Paris the most visited city in all the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 许多宏观前卫的想法都在这个时期诞生。而这股光明从未黯淡，如今每年吸引着四千两百万游客前来造访，使巴黎成为全世界游客人数最多的城市。

yingyinNormal.en: With an estimated 2 million pills being smuggled into the US every day and of students at universities like Stanford saying they have tried it, MDMA or Molly has become a popular drug of choice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 估计每天约有两百万颗摇头丸输入美国，三分之一的大学生表示试过摇头丸，连史丹佛学生也不例外MDMD(摇头丸)，别名"茉莉"，已经成为很流行的药物了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: num. 一百万；一百万个；无数；大众；群众；数百万之众；上百万；数百万；数百万之物；许多

examination_example.sentence: This can mean <highlight>millions</highlight> more in revenue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能意味着数百万以上的收入。

examination_example.sentence: The typical CEO of a top American corporation now makes about $18.9 <highlight>million</highlight> a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国顶级公司的典型首席执行官现在年收入约为1890万美元。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Millions</highlight> of Britons will nonetheless have got a share this weekend of one of that nation's great traditions: the Sunday roast.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本周末数百万英国人仍然会举家共享该国的一大传统：星期日烤肉。

examination_example.sentence: The data of an individual there gains its value only when it is compared with the data of countless <highlight>millions</highlight> more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那里，只有与无数其他人的数据相比，个人数据才能体现价值。

examination_example.sentence: These concerns aren't misplaced: Employment in manufacturing has fallen from 17 <highlight>million</highlight> in 1970 to 12 <highlight>million</highlight> in 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些担忧并非杞人忧天：制造业的就业人数已从1970年的1700万降至2015年的1200万。

examination_example.sentence: However, Obamacare has allowed more than 12 <highlight>million</highlight> people to either get insurance through Medicaid or the exchanges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，奥巴马医改已经允许超过1200万人通过医疗补助计划或医保交易所获得保险。

word_usage.usage: million前有数词修饰时，不论其后是否跟of，million都用单数形式，如：five million 五百万。

million用在of短语前或表示不确定数值时，常用复数形式。
示例：There were millions of people there.
那里人山人海。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: num. 一百万；一百万个；无数；大众；群众；数百万之众；上百万；数百万；数百万之物；许多

examination_example.sentence: In the year 2004, at the height of over-exposure of the Burberry check, the brand's turnover was £715.5 <highlight>million</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2004年，在Burberry支票过度曝光的高峰期，该品牌的营业额为7.155亿英镑。

examination_example.sentence: Last week, Burberry's annual report revealed that £28.6 <highlight>million</highlight> worth of stock was burnt last year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，Burberry的年度报告显示，去年有价值2860万英镑的库存被烧毁。

examination_example.sentence: There are no public databases that contain <highlight>millions</highlight> of faces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前并没有包含数百万人面孔的公共数据库。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: This month, more than 4 <highlight>million</highlight> students across the nation will begin high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本月，全国将有400多万学生开始上高中。

examination_example.sentence: Removing foreign objects from ears and noses costs England almost three <highlight>million</highlight> pounds a year, a study suggests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项研究表明，从耳朵和鼻子中去除异物每年花费英国近三百万英镑。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Millions</highlight> of people travel by plane every single day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天都有数百万人乘飞机旅行。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Millions</highlight> die early from air pollution each year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每年有数百万人因空气污染而早逝。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 百万分之一；第一百万

word_family.mean: num. 一百万；一百万个；无数；大众；群众；数百万之众；上百万；数百万；数百万之物；许多

examination_example.sentence: On August 5, the number of postcards exchanged by members topped 31 <highlight>million</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 8月5日，会员交换明信片数量突破3100万张。

examination_example.sentence: A British woman won a <highlight>million</highlight> prize after she was named the World's Best Teacher.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名英国妇女在被评为世界最佳教师后赢得了100万英镑的奖金。

examination_example.sentence: When the world had just five to ten <highlight>million</highlight> people, they spoke perhaps 12, 000 languages between them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当世界上只有500万到1000万人口的时候，他们之间可能有12000种语言。

examination_example.sentence: Explain that you have a <highlight>million</highlight> things to do and then ask if the two of you can talk at a different time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 解释你有很多事情要做，然后问一下你们俩是否可以换个时间谈谈。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The forest of China has already become the first place in the world, about 2 hundred <highlight>million</highlight> hectares (公顷).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我国的森林已成为世界第一，约2亿公顷。

examination_example.sentence: A 12-year-old user called Elsa has about 2.7 <highlight>million</highlight> fans on Tik Tok.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位名叫Elsa的12岁用户在Tik Tok上拥有约270万粉丝。

examination_example.sentence: The Sahara, the world's largest desert, is more than 9 <highlight>million</highlight> quare kilometers in size.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 撒哈拉沙漠是世界上最大的沙漠，面积超过900万平方公里。

word_usage.usage: 当million前有具体数字时，要用million的单数形式，而且其后不必再用of;millions of表示“数百万的”，表达的是一个不确切的数字概念。
